page.title: 15The Manor Pavilion.
page.content: The{Manor Pavilion}contributes a lot towards Sidmouth's entertainment. Every year 3 or 4 plays are produced, including a Pantomime. People travel a long way to see the performances. The{Sidmouth Amateur Dramatic Society encourages local talent and a lot of youg people are members of it. A Junior Workshop is organised and the Society produces a number of very good short plays. Every year the{Mercury Players}come down from London and perform a series of plays. The Manor Pavilion can seat up to 300 people.
